defs: the quality or state of being a) impure; b) crude; uncultivated; inelegant; c) not subtle; not precise.

to avoid or prevent from happening.
not set up by human; not of the authorship of man; of divine origin.
that is beyond human power; superhuman.
the state or condition of divine origin or beyond human power.
= ಅಪೌರುಷೇಯತೆ.
a man who has begotten a child; the male parent; father.
a mode of addressing one's father.
a suffix to male names.
a mode of addressing any man deserving of respect or reverence because of age, position, etc.
a term of endearment in addressing boys.
a man or a thing, greater, bigger or more harmful, than the other; the daddy of all.

ಅಪ್ಪ ಅಮ್ಮ ಅನ್ನು appa amma annu to beseech humbly; ಅಪ್ಪ ಅಮ್ಮನ ಜಗಳದಲ್ಲಿ ಕೂಸು ಬಡವಾಯಿತು appa ammana jagaḷadalli kūsu baḍavāyitu (prov.) when two bigs fight, it is the vulnerable that suffers; ಅಪ್ಪನ್ನ ಅಪ್ಪ ಅನ್ನದವ ಚಿಕ್ಕಪ್ಪನ್ನ ಅಪ್ಪ ಅಂದಾನೆ? appanna appa annadava cikkappanna appa andāne (prov.) does one, who does not respect his own father, respect any another person? ಅಪ್ಪ ಕಟ್ಟಿಸಿದ ಬಾವಿಯೆಂದು ಉಪ್ಪುನೀರನ್ನು ಕುಡಿ appa kaṭṭisida bāviyendu uppunīrannu kuḍi (prov.) = ಅಪ್ಪ ಹಾಕಿದ ಆಲಮರ ಅಂತ ನೇಣು ಹಾಕಿಕೊ; ಅಪ್ಪ ಹಾಕಿದ ಆಲದಮರ appahākida āladamara (fig.) unquestioned belief, profession or sentiment that has been handed over from a father to his son; ಅಪ್ಪ ಹಾಕಿದ ಆಲಮರ ಅಂತ ನೇಣು ಹಾಕಿಕೊ appahākida āladamara anta nēṇu hākiko (prov.) to cling to the tradition despite it being foolish, unprofitable or not advantageous; a man may love his house, yet not ride on the ridge; ಅಪ್ಪ ಸತ್ತು ಆರು ತಿಂಗಳಿಗೆ ಬಂದು ಹುಚ್ಚು ಮಾವ ಕೊರಳುಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಂಡು ಅತ್ತ appa sattu āru tiŋgaḷige bandu, huccumāva koraḷukaṭṭikondu atta (prov.) to show sympathy hypocritically; or in a stupid manner.
a small round sweet cake made of rice flour, coconut, jaggery, etc. and fried in ghee or oil.
a swollen part of the body;
ಅಪ್ಪ ತಿಂದರೆ ಸಾಲದೆ ಕಾವಲಿ ಛಿದ್ರ ಏಕೆ? appa tindare sālade, kāvali chidra ēke (prov.) no matter what the vessel is, the wine must be good.
an interjection to express astonishment, pain or fatigue.
proper; right; appropriate; fitting; seemly.
a proper or decent man.

ಅಪ್ಪಂತೋರು appantōru (pl.) respectable and elderly persons. ಅಟ್ಟಡಿಗೆ ಮಿಗಲಿಲ್ಲ, ಅಪ್ಪಂತೋರು ಉಣಲಿಲ್ಲ aṭṭaḍige migalilla, appantōru uṇalilla effort was there, but with no avail; ಅಪ್ಪಂತೋರು ಕೈಹಿಡಿದರೆ, ಒಪ್ಪದಿರುವುದು ಹೇಗೆ? appantavaru kaihiḍidare oppadiruvudu hēge (prov.) when good luck knocks at the door, why keep it shut.
the quality or condition of being decent; propriety of conduct and speech; proper behaviour, modesty, courtesy, etc.; decency.
a decent woman.
properly; in a manner fit for the purpose.
(children's term) a thing fit to be eaten.
that which is flat and thin (such as cake).
anything squeezed, crushed, shapeless mass.
ಅಪ್ಪಚ್ಚಿಮಾಡು appaccimāḍu to squeeze or crush and convert into a shapeless, strengthless mass.
an younger brother of one's father.
free from any adulterant; unmixed; pure; clear.
(authority etc.) perfect; complete; absolute.
= ಅಪ್ಪಟ.
the state or quality of being perfectly flat.
a honourable prefix to men's names.
an order, command, direction or instruction, usually backed by authority.

the act of permitting; esp., formal consent; permission; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಕೇಳು appaṇe kēḷu to seek permission, approval or order; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಕೊಡಿಸು appaṇe koḍisu 'please telḷ, ' please order'; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಕೊಡು appaṇekoḍu to isse an order; to command; 2. to give consent to; to permit; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಗುಡು appaṇeguḍu = ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಕೊಡು; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಗೊಡು appaṇegoḍu = ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಕೊಡು; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆ ತೆಗೆದುಕೊ appaṇe tegeduko to take permission, approval or order; 2. (fig.) to go to the other world; to die; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಪಡೆ appaṇe paḍe to get an order; to receive instructions; 2) to get permission; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಮಾಡು appaṇe mādu to instruct to do something; to give an order; to command; to order; ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಹೊಂದು appaṇehondu = ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಪಡೆ.
a kind of tax.
the quality of being logically integrated, consistent, and intelligible; congruity; coherence.
a written order or instruction.
(fig.) an order of dismissal of a person from a job.
(fig.) death.
ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಚೀಟಿತೆಗೆದುಕೊ appaṇecīṭi tegeduko (fig.) to die.
= ಅಪ್ಪಣೆಪಡೆ.
betel leaves, with areca nut pieces given a) with the consent of elders in a religious or social ceremony; b) as a mark of commissioning to a position (by a king).
the state of being a father; fatherhood; paternity.
the ocean, as the final resort of all water.
Varuṇa, the Lord of oceans.
a tax (levied by a government).
a tribute or an offering made by a subordinate to a king as acknowledgement of subjugation.
(dial.) one's father's younger brother; paternal uncle.
the final destruction of the universe.
a kind of plant.
